A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's visually stunning but sort of a narrative mess.  I found the movie underwhelming as a whole and overlong.  Mark Hamill was a weak link but really\, if you take the nostalgia goggles off\, he was a weak link in the original trilogy as well.  Great voice actor\, but not a great actor.  Snoke has to go down as one of the most poorly developed villains in film history.  Any way\, was the movie bad? no\, it was okay.  Just sort of meh
